title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Infrastructure for Spatial Information in
heading: 3. (1) The functions vested in the Minister for Housing, Local Government
text_raw:
3. (1) The functions vested in the Minister for Housing, Local Government 

and Heritage under the – 

(a) European Communities (Establishing an Infrastructure for

Regulations 2010 (S.I. No. 382 of 2010), and

(2) References to the Minister for Housing, Local Government and 
Heritage contained in any Act or instrument made under such Act and relating 
to any functions transferred by this Article shall, from the commencement of 
this Order, be construed as references to the Minister for the Environment, 
Climate and Communications.

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Infrastructure for Spatial Information in
heading: 4. Where, immediately before the commencement of this Order, any legal
text_raw:
4. Where, immediately before the commencement of this Order, any legal 
proceedings are pending to which the Minister for Housing, Local Government 
and Heritage is a party and the proceedings have reference to functions 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 8th March, 2024.

transferred by this Order to the Minister for the Environment, Climate and 
Communications, the name of the Minister for Housing, Local Government 
and Heritage shall, in so far as the proceedings relate to any function 
transferred by this Order, be substituted in the proceedings for that of the 
Minister for the Environment, Climate and Communications or added in the 
proceedings, as may be appropriate, and the proceedings shall not abate by 
reason of such substitution.

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Infrastructure for Spatial Information in
heading: 5. Anything commenced before the commencement of this Order by or
text_raw:
5. Anything commenced before the commencement of this Order by or 
under the authority of the Minister for Housing, Local Government and 
Heritage may, in so far as it relates to functions transferred by this Order to the 
Minister for the Environment, Climate and Communications, be carried on or 
completed on or after such commencement by the Minister for the 
Environment, Climate and Communications.
text_norm: 5 anything commenced commencement order authority minister housing local government heritage may far relates function transferred order minister environment climate communication carried completed commencement minister environment climate communication

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Infrastructure for Spatial Information in
heading: 6. Every document (including any certificate or licence) granted or made
text_raw:
6. Every document (including any certificate or licence) granted or made 
in the performance of a function transferred by this Order shall, if and in so far 
as it was operative immediately before the commencement of this Order, have 
effect from such commencement as if it had been granted or made by the 
Minister for the Environment, Climate and Communications.
text_norm: 6 every document (including certificate licence) granted made performance function transferred order shall far operative immediately commencement order effect commencement granted made minister environment climate communication

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Infrastructure for Spatial Information in
heading: 7. References to the Minister for Housing, Local Government and
text_raw:
7. References to the Minister for Housing, Local Government and 
Heritage contained in the constitution of any company and relating to any 
function transferred by this Order shall, from the commencement of this Order, 
be construed as references to the Minister for the Environment, Climate and 
Communications.
text_norm: 7 reference minister housing local government heritage contained constitution company relating function transferred order shall commencement order construed reference minister environment climate communication

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Infrastructure for Spatial Information in
heading: 8. (1) All property, rights and liabilities held, enjoyed or incurred before
text_raw:
8. (1) All property, rights and liabilities held, enjoyed or incurred before 
the commencement of this Order by the Minister for Housing, Local 
Government and Heritage, in connection with the functions transferred by this 
Order are transferred to the Minister for the Environment, Climate and 
Communications and, accordingly, without any further conveyance, transfer or 
assignment, on such commencement – 

(a) 

(b) 

(c) 

that property, both real and personal, vests in the Minister for 
the Environment, Climate and Communications, 

those rights shall be enjoyed by 
Environment, Climate and Communications, and 

the Minister for 

the 

liabilities are 

those 
Environment, Climate and Communications. 

liabilities of 

the Minister 

for 

the 

(2) All moneys, stocks, shares and securities transferred to the Minister for 
the Environment, Climate and Communications by this Article which, on the 
commencement of this Order, are standing in the name of the Minister for 
Housing, Local Government and Heritage shall, on the request of the Minister 
for the Environment, Climate and Communications, be transferred into the 
name of the Minister for the Environment, Climate and Communications.
